entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: BrokingSapphire/FormFillerJS: FormFillerJS is a lightweight, asynchronous Node.js project designed to dynamically fill PDF form fields using the pdf-lib library. It supports reading, modifying, and saving PDF files with ease and flexibility, allowing user inputs to be injected dynamically.
entry.content: FormFillerJS is a lightweight, asynchronous Node.js project designed to dynamically fill PDF form fields using the pdf-lib library. It supports reading, modifying, and saving PDF files with ease and flexibility, allowing user inputs to be injected dynamically.

entry.title: Shimpukalikeee/tablock: The Tab Lock Extension is a lightweight and secure browser extension designed for Google Chrome and Brave that allows users to lock specific tabs to prevent accidental closure or unauthorized access. This extension is perfect for users who need to keep important tabs open, whether for work, research, or privacy-sensitive browsing.
entry.content: The Tab Lock Extension is a lightweight and secure browser extension designed for Google Chrome and Brave that allows users to lock specific tabs to prevent accidental closure or unauthorized access. This extension is perfect for users who need to keep important tabs open, whether for work, research, or privacy-sensitive browsing.
